A 5.1 magnitude tremor also occurred near Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky recently.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-strikes-russia-6-1-magnitude-tremor-jolts-kurli-islands-comes-days-after-8-8-kamchatka-quake/articleshow/123206978.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-strikes-russia-6-1-magnitude-tremor-jolts-kurli-islands-comes-days-after-8-8-kamchatka-quake/articleshow/123206978.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 20:27:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="776781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123206976,imgsize-776781.cms"/></item><item><title>Former Pakistan pacer makes massive Siraj admission: 'He's not just ...'</title><description><![CDATA[Wasim Akram hails Mohammed Siraj's transformation from a support bowler to India's pace spearhead after his match-winning performance at the Oval. The victims, a 65-year-old man, a 19-year-old man, and an 18-year-old woman, are in stable condition at Bellevue Hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nyc-times-square-shooting-3-injured-in-gunfire-after-verbal-dispute-videos-show-people-fleeing-victim-on-stretcher/articleshow/123203771.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nyc-times-square-shooting-3-injured-in-gunfire-after-verbal-dispute-videos-show-people-fleeing-victim-on-stretcher/articleshow/123203771.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 15:30:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1014991" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123203899,imgsize-1014991.cms"/></item><item><title>Dharali flash floods: FIR against 5 for 'Nature's bulldozer' comment</title><description><![CDATA[Dehradun police have registered a case against five individuals, including one unidentified person, for allegedly posting and commenting on a Facebook update about the Dharali flash floods. The post, captioned "this is nature's bulldozer," along with the comments, is accused of hurting religious sentiments and promoting enmity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/fir-against-5-for-natures-bulldozer-comment/articleshow/123200838.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/fir-against-5-for-natures-bulldozer-comment/articleshow/123200838.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:39:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KALYAN DAS</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36182" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200906,imgsize-36182.cms"/></item><item><title>Udaipur shocker: Woman, mother-in-law burnt alive after dispute</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Udaipur's Jindoli village, a woman, Mangi Gameti, and her mother-in-law, Pappa Bai, died after Mangi set herself on fire following a domestic dispute with her husband. The fire rapidly spread due to inflammable materials in the room, trapping both women.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/woman-mother-in-law-burned-alive-in-udaipur-after-domestic-dispute/articleshow/123195919.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/woman-mother-in-law-burned-alive-in-udaipur-after-domestic-dispute/articleshow/123195919.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:40:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35816" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200979,imgsize-35816.cms"/></item><item><title>Ahmedabad woman gets 2 years in jail for throwing baby from 9th floor</title><description><![CDATA[An Ahmedabad court convicted a 25-year-old woman to two years in jail for concealing the birth and disposing of her newborn child's body. Residents of Skywalk Society discovered the infant's body in April 2023, suspecting it was thrown from the ninth floor. While charged with murder, the prosecution failed to prove intent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/woman-gets-2-years-in-jail-for-throwing-baby-from-9th-floor-in-ahmedabad/articleshow/123194973.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/woman-gets-2-years-in-jail-for-throwing-baby-from-9th-floor-in-ahmedabad/articleshow/123194973.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:52:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17792" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200510,imgsize-17792.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[Tata Consumers inks deal to open new markets for Araku coffee, to be served at Starbucks]]></title>

      <description><![CDATA[The Coffee Board also signed agreements to expand coffee cultivation in tribal areas, while ITC committed to adding 1,600 hectares to its coffee plantations in Paderu, supplementing its existing 4,010 hectares.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Starbucks is trying to stage a comeback after an uncharacteristic streak of same-store sales declines over the past year and a half.
